channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024050589
item.description:
Report X-2024050589

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-17T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-01
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AFTER OPENING THE PACKAGE, RESPONDER DISCOVERED THAT AT LEAST TWO OF THE FOUR GALLON BOTTLES (ACETIC ACID GLACIAL) HAD LEAKED, AND THREE TOTAL BOTTLES WERE AFFECTED BY THE LEAKAGE. THE AFFECTED BOTTLES AND MATERIAL ARE BEING PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP, AND ONE UNAFFECTED BOTTLE WILL BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER VIA SALVAGE DRUM.

item.title: Report X-2024050590
item.description:
Report X-2024050590

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-17T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-30
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE CLASS 8 HAZMAT WAS FOUND ON THE IRREG SLIDE OF DOOR 25 AND WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. THE BOX HAD BEEN LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER UNKNOWN LEAKER. AFTER OPENING THE BOX IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE MERCHANDISE (ECOLAB AQUANOMIC 2.0 LOW TEMP LAUNDRY SOLID DETERGENT) WAS ALSO LEAKING WITHIN THE BOX. ALL MERCHANDISE WAS AFFECTED BY THE INTERNAL SPILL AND WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024050445
item.description:
Report X-2024050445

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-13T15:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-30
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY ONE POUND OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING FOOD. THE PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS NON-REGULATED NORDIC ICE GEL PACKS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX IS PREPRINTED REFRIGERATED SHIPMENT, PERISHABLE, HANDLE WITH CARE, AND HAS ORIENTATION ARROWS. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
